Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://031126.xyz/sitemap.xml

# Google AdSense
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

# Disallow admin or private directories (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /.well-known/

# Allow all web crawlers to access CSS and JS files
User-agent: *
Allow: /assets/
Allow: /*.css
Allow: /*.js
